name: Analyze Root Cause
description: Diagnose root cause of detected anomalies

movements.name: Analyze Root Cause
movements.description: Analyze anomalies and diagnose root causes

beats.title: Analysis Requested
beats.scenario: Scan, Discover, or Analyze analyze Requested
acceptanceCriteria:
Given the analyzeRequested operation is triggered
When the handler executes
Then it completes successfully within < 5 seconds
And the output is valid and meets schema
And any required events are published

Given valid input parameters
When analyzeRequested processes them
Then results conform to expected schema
And no errors are thrown
And telemetry events are recorded with latency metrics

Given error conditions
When analyzeRequested encounters an error
Then the error is logged with full context
And appropriate recovery is attempted
And the system remains stable

Given performance SLA of < 5 seconds
When analyzeRequested executes
Then latency is consistently within target
And throughput meets baseline requirements
And resource usage stays within bounds

Given compliance and governance
When analyzeRequested operates
Then all governance rules are enforced
And audit trails capture execution
And no compliance violations occur
beats.testCase: initiates diagnosis with a valid envelope (Given anomalies detected, When user triggers diagnosis, Then analysis sequence begins)
beats.userStory: As an operations system, I want analyzeRequested to execute reliably with latency < 5 seconds so that dependent services meet their SLA targets (goal: 99.9% success rate).
